page.title: 12SCHOOL LIFE - CHELTENHAM
page.content: {EDUCATION.}Dunalley Street Primary School is a very old school,built in 1859. The school is mainly one large building, we have a hall and canteen. The canteen was built during the Second World War when it was used as an emergency feeding centre for those people whose homes had been bombed. In the morning we have Assembly when we have hymns and prayers. Sometimes we listen to records or to children playing flutes,clarinets and recorder We have milk during morning playtime At lunchtime some have a hot school dinner (cost 65p),some bring their own sandwiches and others go home. Like other schools we enjoy school trips. This year we went to Slimbridge Wildfowl Centre.
